Name: Name Change, Harry Rosen Way-Cheesecake Corner, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to a street name Harry Rosen Way - Cheesecake Corner, Borough of Brooklyn.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.Action: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Int. No. 506

Introduced by Council Members Fisher, Berman, Dear, Marshall and Abel.

A LOCAL LAW

In relation to a street name, Harry Rosen Way-Cheesecake Corner, Borough of Brooklyn.

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.


New namePresent nameLimitsHarry Rosen Way-Cheesecake Corner (none)the northwest corner of Flatbush Avenue and
Dekalb Avenue

ï¿½ 2. This local law shall take effect immediately.





_______
Note: Matter in italics is new; matter in brackets [ ] to be omitted.
